attributes.review: I was really excited about this app, but had some trouble accessing content. I contacted their support team and was told I was a fugly little baby rat! Then they told me they had my social security number and all of my children’s, and we’re going to steal our identities to allow all the nasty immigrants in and throw a rave for them! Then somebody from their team showed up at my house and punted my 3 year old across the lawn! Not impressed
attributes.title: Worst app ever!!

attributes.review: This app took days to download and when I FINALLY opened it all I saw was a stale cheeto staring back at me which made me extremely uncomfortable. I have never seen an app mess up my phone so much in my life. It flooded my screen with bigotry, racism, misogyny, homophobia, and many many MANY more terrible things! As if the small troll-like man on the opening screen wasn’t enough to bring me nightmares, the content found further into the app sure will. GROSS.
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: if i could leave a 0 star review, i would. this app took FOREVER to download. i was trying to educate myself but i learned nothing. this app had the audacity to ask for my phone number. like who do you think you are?? the bright colors of the opening screen blinded me as i opened the app. there is too much wrong with this app to write all of it. i am absolutely disgusted. good day sir.
attributes.title: I actually have to go barf i’ll be right back

attributes.review: Y’all banding TikTok but we still ain’t get justice for my community, we still get police brutality, and y’all tryna band my TikTok.  sense corona been going on and school is over during quarantine I’ve learned how my black sisters and brothers get treated differently because of the color of our skin I want justice and I want it it now(everyone give this app the worst review) P.S they wanna take TikTok down cuz my community speaking facts and has websites to get justice and donate to our community
attributes.title: Smh

attributes.review: Do not download this app by any means. Why, You might ask? Well first of all ever since trump became president more racist people decided to show their true colors. And I doubt you want to support an app and president that encourages hate amongst the human race. He also is very incompetent. Other countries were able to control COVID. While trump only cared about the economy and not people’s lives. Anyway I forgot what I was going to say, so please don’t download this app😁.
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD !

attributes.review: It took several months to download. Once it was down downloading it made my house smell like trash. And it took out 97% of my storage even though I never used it cause it was so bad. Also I tried to delete it but it redownloaded instantly. DO NOT GET THIS APP IM WARNING YOU⚠️‼️So make sure you give it a bad review because I dont want anyone else to deal with what I have gone through. Also it will make your house smell really bad because it is trash.😌🧚🏼✨
attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD!

attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I wanted to see what my favorite Cheeto was up to 😍. However this app just got weirder and weirder the longer it was on my phone 🤔. I started getting some questionable notifications 🤭. It was as if the app could sense I was a women 🧍🏻‍♀️and started harassing me 💕 to stay in the kitchen 🍽 and that my only reason for existing is to be sexualized 🤩. Finally deleted the app when it told me I shouldn’t be allowed to vote 😊
attributes.title: No🥰

attributes.review: this app took FOREVER to download and then after a few weeks when it did, it wiped my phone. i had to get a new one because it was hacked. it got all of my information and wiped it. my debit card was hacked and i lost everything. and then i had people coming to my house telling me that IM the problem because of something this app did. unbelievable. like cant i just live my life? anyways settle for biden babes 🥰✨
attributes.title: horrible!!

attributes.review: as soon as i opened the app i got calls. they were saying they were going to hack my phone. they said they had my dog and they were going to kill it if i didn’t get people to vote for him. i went around town and i got kidnapped. their was my dog and we were sitting their waiting. just as we were going to get liked my mom came and started beating them with her shoe. we got out and escaped. but we almost DIED. DO NOT GET THIS APP😡😡😡
attributes.title: terrible😡😡

attributes.review:
TWILIGHT

                                    Written by         
          
                                 Melissa Rosenberg
          
          
          
                               Based on the novel by 

                                  Stephenie Meyer
          

          

                                                        SHOOTING DRAFT
                                                     February 11, 2008
          
          
          
          FADE IN:
          
          
          1 EXT. RAIN FOREST, OLYMPIC NATIONAL PARK, WASHINGTON - DAWN 
          
          Moss-draped. Shadow-drenched. Tortured tree trunks twist 
          upward, reaching for rare sunlight. 
          
          
          BELLA (V.O.)
          I'd never given much thought to how I would die..
          
          Suddenly, every creature in the forest is deadly silent. Neither 
          bird, beast nor insect make a noise. A predator is near. 
          
          Then, in the distance, hear a tiny SNI
attributes.title: Terrible
